title: Cup, "Half Teacup", 1923
markings: Marks: On underside: Suprematism, square logo, hammer, sickle, cog, 1923, N 474/578, [after] Ilia Chasnik hand-painted in black overglaze
provenance: The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection
creditline: The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection; Partial gift and partial purchase through the Decorative Arts Association Acquisition and Smithsonian Collections Acquisition Program Funds
description: In the shape of a cup sliced in half through the middle, with applied flat solid square handle; both round side and flat side of cup painted with Suprematist decorations composed of black and reddish-brown geometric shapes floating on white background.

tombstone.epitaph:
Cup, "Half Teacup", 1923.
1923. Porcelain, enamel. The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection; Partial gift and partial purchase through the Decorative Arts Association Acquisition and Smithsonian Collections Acquisition Program Funds. 1989-41-68.
